resources.string: View our online tutorials for product setup and use here.

All components are now pairing.

Sit back and relax. Big and complex projects take longer than small ones. Keep pairing until your bulbs have turned green or purple.

If you have a couple of bulbs that just won’t turn green, end the pairing, go to the home screen, hit the paint bucket and set the bulbs to a color. If they change to the right color they’re paired! If they didn’t, you can pair again or replace the bulb.

End pairing when the correct number of switches are indicated below.

 To force pair a switch, unplug and plug it back in now.

End pairing when all bulbs have turned green.

 For pairing questions or troubleshooting, visit www.VLCPRO.com/LSHelp.
